       a {
          text-decoration:none;
      }
       .ReadMsgBody{
           width: 100%;

      }

           background-color: #ffffff;
           line-height:100% !important;
      }
       body {
           width: 100%;
           background-color: #ffffff;
           margin: 0;
           padding: 0;
